channel.title: Couple Questions
channel.description:
I have a couple questions about web design and forum design.
1. I already have a good forums with over 100 people. What i want to do is add reputation like the little boxes and all. How do i do this. Here is my forums:
http://dudescapeforums.smfforfree3.com/index.php
I dont know if im able to do with that...
2. I am useing Microsoft Publisher 2007 and im making a Website. Its nearly done but how do i "publish" it into the internet. If this is not possible with the URL i want does anyone know a site i can use to make a complete website with my own URL not some stupid thing like www.freewebs.com/NAMEHERE
I want somthing like
www.NAMEHERE.com
If i can do that WITHOUT having to pay money monthley or yearly id really apreciate it. Thanks

item.title: Couple Questions
item.dc:creator: @Cyclone Cyclone
item.description:
@Cyclone wrote:

God this kid sucks… no offence

A domain COSTS MONEY!!!

and you will never get rep system cos smf did it with karma and u modify tht in the files in directory

You are not using real smf from www.simplemachines.org … maybe cos u cant figure mysql but still ask for help!!!

Stop using nooby things and pay for em if u wana make it look good!

Read full topic

item.title: Couple Questions
item.dc:creator: @TestDummy TestDummy
item.description:
@TestDummy wrote:

In regards to the second question, it’s called “paying for a domain”.

If you can’t bother to pay the few dollars it takes to get one, you don’t need it. You’ll just have to live with the sub-domains free hosts give you.

And a site in made in Publisher? Ugh…

Read full topic
